
                            
                            <p>昨天刚注册的号，用了一张剩余的全部失效，问客服说用一张就不是新客了所以剩余的都作废了，怎么杠？ <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/19/153806h6akcve0wr0ar6lg.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/19/153806h6akcve0wr0ar6lg.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">没说错啊</p>
